price: Allah ni We wabahaye amatungo kugira ngo mugire ayo mugendaho ndetse n’ayo murya.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ لِتَرۡكَبُواْ مِنۡهَا وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-anʿāma litarkabū min'hā wamin'hā takulūna
